title: Maria Stewart on enslaved women- sources evidence

content.question: Which of the following pieces of evidence from the source could best be used to support the argument that Stewart sought to make her views seem less radical?

choices.label: She called on women to imitate the boldness of men when advocating for their rights.
She encouraged women to exert their influence through their roles as mothers raising children.
She expressed the expectation that some people would scoff and frown at her ideas about women.
She declared that women had talents that they were not allowed to show while focused on domestic chores.

content.answer: She encouraged women to exert their influence through their roles as mothers raising children.

topic.text: 2.14: Black Organizing in the North: Freedom, Women's Rights, and Education
